A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While not only showing you can actually make an original Starwars movie without using the same plot from a movie from the original trilogy *cough cough The Force Awakens cough cough* Starwars: The Last Jedi has an balanced amount of epic\, memorial scenes and also (surprising) comedy thanks to the late Carrie Fisher. This movie could have been PERFECT if there weren’t unnecessary scenes (I’m looking at you shirtless Kyle Ren). Other than that this movie doesn’t fall short and is worth seeing
